fields.description:
It would be a great feature to display a list of device list after asking which platform to run the app for (iOS, Android, Web,..) 

Without the feature, i think the latest version of the device is used (in simulator) to run the app in.
fields.summary: Ask for Apple device to run the app

comments.body: This is already possible in Studio. If you want this feature in the CLI, use {{appc ti info}} to get the UUID's of the devices across the platforms.
